Output 1 provides comprehensive documentation with multiple approaches but lacks executable procedural logic. Output 2 delivers a cleaner, more executable solution using proper Snowflake scripting. Difference: Output 1 suggests manual execution steps while Output 2 provides automated procedural approach.

Average of both outputs. Both are syntactically sound with proper Snowflake compatibility. Output 2 has better executable structure while Output 1 has more comprehensive documentation.
